# isFindBarVisible

**Instance Property**

Returns whether the container should display its find bar.

## Declaration

```swift
var isFindBarVisible: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] and the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFinderBarContainer/findBarView] property is set, then the find bar is displayed by the container. Otherwise, the find bar is not displayed.

The default value should be [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Find Bar View

- **findBarView**: The view assigned by the text bar as the find bar view for the container.
- **contentView()**: A view hierarchy that contains all the views which display the contents being searched.
